description: This Dart source file defines the BookingsService class, which provides functionalities to create and manage bookings in a mobile application. It interacts with an API client to perform HTTP POST requests to create bookings and handles errors appropriately.

classes.name: BookingsService
classes.description: A service class responsible for creating and managing bookings through API calls.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Asynchronously creates a new booking by sending booking details to the server, and returns a Booking object upon success.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles DioException errors, extracting relevant error messages to throw.
